description.en:
The nature of design anthropology.
Conducting design studies.
The difference between qualitative research methods and quantitative ones.
Methods: interview, focus group, observation.
description.et:
Disainiantropoloogia olemus. 
Disainiuuringute läbiviimine. 
Kvalitatiivsete uuirmismeetodite erinevus kvantitatiivsetest. 
Meetodid: intervjuu, fookusgrupp, vaatlus.

objectives.en: Provide knowledge of the main qualitative data collection methods used in design studies.
objectives.et: Eesmärk on anda teadmised disainiuuringute käigus kasutatavatest peamistest kvalitatiivsetest andmekogumismeetoditest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows the stages of conducting a design study;
3) knows the strengths and weaknesses of interviewing, focus groups and observation as a qualitative method and the specifics of implementation in the context of design research.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) teab intervjueerimise, fookusrühmade ning vaatluse kui kvalitatiivse meetodi tugevusi ja nõrkusi ning rakendamise spetsiifikat disainiuuringute kontekstis.
